rocks.bastion.core.printer

Class ResponsePrinter

  • java.lang.Object
    • rocks.bastion.core.printer.ResponsePrinter

  • public class ResponsePrinter
extends Object
    Prints the given Response object in the same format that it is sent with using the HTTP protocol. This class is useful for logging and debugging purposes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ResponsePrinter(Response response)
      Constructs a new instance of this printer to format the specified response object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getAsString()
      Formats and returns the response object.
      void print(Writer writer)
      Formats and prints the response object to the specified Writer stream.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ResponsePrinter

        public ResponsePrinter(Response response)
        Constructs a new instance of this printer to format the specified response object.
        Parameters:
        response - The response object to format. Cannot be null.

    • Method Detail

      • print

        public void print(Writer writer)
           throws IOException
        Formats and prints the response object to the specified Writer stream. The format used when outputting the response conforms to the HTTP standard.
        Parameters:
        writer - The writer to output to. Cannot be null.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown if the response could not be formatted and sent to the specified writer.

      • getAsString

        public String getAsString()
        Formats and returns the response object. The format produced by this method for the response conforms to the HTTP standard.
        Returns:
        A string representation of the HTTP data received
